reviews.name: Ryan & Katy
reviews.text: Just wanted to thank the guys at Perfect Events for hosting our wedding! It was absolutely fantastic! The music catered for every single person in the room and it really did make our wedding party so enjoyable for all of our guests. Declan was brilliant on the mic and his knowledge of music really showed from the first song to the very last! Can't recommend these guys enough and will be getting them booked again for other family weddings.

reviews.name: Judy and Andy
reviews.text: Hey Deccy I just wanted to say a huge thank you for making our wedding something to remember. The music was amazing, the craic was next level and your stars in your eyes segment was the most I have laughed in ages especially my colleague Phil as Britney lol You were the perfect addition to our broadway wedding and we loved every single second of it. Thank you for an amazing night we wont forget.

reviews.name: Mr & Mrs McCambridge
reviews.text: We had the pleasure of having Dan play at our wedding, and he was absolutely brilliant. From start to finish, he kept the dance floor packed and he knew exactly how to read the crowd. His music selection was spot on, and he seamlessly blended our requests with tunes that everybody loved. The energy he brought truly made the night unforgettable, and many of our guests commented on how fantastic he was. If you are looking for a DJ who will elevate your event and keep everyone dancing, we highly recommend Dan.

reviews.name: Mr & Mr Fitzpatrick
reviews.text: Well Declan what can i say other than from the bottom of my heart thank you! You both made our wedding the most magical and beautiful experience from start to finish, there wasn't a moment that wasn't captured and catered for. You helped us create our dream night from the moment we entered the room, there wasn't a second the dance floor wasn't full. Trust me I have sore hips, heels and ankles to prove it lol Incredible thank you so much!

reviews.name: Mark
reviews.text: Big thanks to Daniel for doing a brilliant job last night at our 70's & 80's themed birthday party. He did a great job getting plenty on the dance floor.
